topics.body: I just thought of something; the human race will more than likely continue no matter what is thrown at us by this point cause even if 99.9999934% of the human race were to be wiped out we could theoretically make a eventual comeback.  It would take something like the sun going supernova or something to wipe out the entire human race to the point we could never come back.
